alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:07PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dawson County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1106 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cozad, or 18 miles northwest of Lexington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eddyville and Sumner. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 212. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
